===== Requires DXCore 10.2 since build 1711 =====
== Introduction ==
Provides an action/command to close all files except the current one and it's Test equivalent.

== Configuration ==
Use [http://community.devexpress.com/blogs/rorybecker/archive/2010/10/05/binding-keys-in-coderush.aspx these instructions] to bind the '!CloseAllButThisAndTestDocument' command to a key of your choice.

== Usage ==
Use the key in you bound at configuration whilst within a class to preserve that file and any other which is named after that class with a '_tests' suffix.
